how is the quality compared to the normal DVD version?

.TS-file

Video: MPEG2 Video 1920x1088 (16:9) 29.97fps 14250Kbps [Video]
Audio: Dolby AC3 48000Hz 6ch 384Kbps [Audio]
Subtitle: DVD Subpicture [Subtitle]

(1080i -> 1088 = the 8 last lines are grey)

The source is said to be 1080i... compared to a DVD which is normally 576p (or less). I use Media Player Classic and pan & scan to fill my screen (1680x1050 16:10 wide). 

It looks twice as good as the DVD so I guess it's correct. In my opinion worth downloading...
